document.full_text: seve ballesteros, one of golf's most charismatic players who was renowned for his fist-pumping energy and magical shot-making, died saturday at the age of 54 after a long battle with brain cancer.
document.title: inspirational champion ballesteros dies aged 54
lines_and_colors: seve ballesteros, one of golf's most charismatic players who was renowned for his fist-pumping energy and magical shot-making, died saturday at the age of 54 after a long battle with brain cancer.
